data.message: Created V6 "Atmospheric Cinema" Cinematch homepage mockup in Pencil: Complete mockup with hero (profile card + waveform), proof band, 3x2 vibe cards grid, how it works, featured composers, CTA with segmentation, footer. Fixed multiple layout issues (missing horizontal layouts, text overflow).
